resources.string: The museum carries out fascinating excursions to the magic world of old dolls. You will get acquainted with the history of the development of puppet craftsmanship, a unique exposition of puppets from different countries and eras, materials of their manufacture and their purpose.

Gallery of author\'s dolls \"Doll\'s Lane\" is not just a place where you can see hundreds of handmade dolls, created by the best Russian and foreign artists - a special world, who will be happy and surprised to discover children and adults.
The museum \"Zabawushka\" gives a unique opportunity for children and adults to plunge into the fabulous world of folk toys, play, invent a fairy tale and show it with toys.

The Museum of dolls of Obraztsov Doll Theater occupies a special place on the museum map of Russia and the world. Having begun once from the exhibition on the balcony in the first building of the theater in Mayakovsky Square, now it is the largest in Russia and one of the largest in the world - more than 4 thousand units of storage.

In the museum of childhood, located on the 7th floor of the Central Children\'s Shop in Lubyanka, more than 1000 exhibits are collected. There are toys, books, records, films, radio programs linking more than one generation of people.
International Doll Salon organizes the Spring Ball of art dolls during the most beautiful spring holiday - International Women\'s Day.
Moscow international exhibition and fair of dolls and Teddy bears.
Dollscar is the biggest BJD Con in Russia, 1000 square meters of expo space for ABJD and other jointed dolls.
This is significant and long-awaited event which consistently gathers artists and lovers of dolls and author toys from all over the world.
The largest exhibition of dolls in the world take place in the historic center of the Russian capital in the \"Gostiny Dvor\".
